messages.subject: Florida
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I was wondering if anyone on this list lives in South Florida?  I normally am in Trinidad - Southern Caribbean - but am in South Miami Beach this
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
I was wondering if anyone on this list lives in South Florida? I normally am in Trinidad -
Southern Caribbean - but am in South Miami Beach this week. I used to live here up to about
2 years ago and now am trying to be back in this area about every 2 to 3 months for a week
or two. It would be great to make some connections here. I always found South Beach itself
to have very few homeschoolers - of any philosophy - so it would be great to meet other
homeschoolers in this area. But if there are any unschoolers then that would be extra
wonderful.
Thanks a million
Gillian
Mother to 8 year old Kwamena and 3 year old Efua
